5. Lin Perry, Mayor Pro-Tem

Lin Perry, MAYOR PRO-TEM
========================

Lin Perry represents the west ward. Mr. Perry was re-elected in May 2023.

Councilmember Perry can be contacted by emailing
[Lin.Perry@rockdale](mailto:Lin.Perry@rockdalecityhall.com)
[tx.gov](//tx.gov)
